Changed reload all tabs icon

Resized some of the customize buttons
Added icons to Guerilla Scripting

Converted to a Bootstrapped extension (restartless)
Bumped minimum version for Firefox and Thunderbird to 8.0 (SM to 2.5)

Exposed disabletoolbarbutton in about:config
Added disabled icons for radios and checkboxes
Added more icons to Firefox, Thunderbird, hopefully all of Enigmail, and Lightning
Fixed issue with blinking items in PanelUI and rotate icons style
Fixed some issues with Tab Mix Plus (and some more icons added)
Removed Sunbird support

Rebuilt css files/options to add more fine grained control
(and so you can disable hover for less laggy menus)

Added option to hide menu icons
Added icons to SQLite Manager, Configuration Mania, Cookies Manager+
Added ugly workaround for checkboxes continuing to have the same list-style-image after you remove a CSS style
Changed some menuitems to checkmarks (as they should be) rather then icons
Fixed issue with default radio icons not showing up
Fixed issues with checkmark/radio icons not under Windows
Fixed dropmaker icons under *BSD

release_notes.en-US:
Reworked a large amount of CSS rules for icons
please expect and report any issues (cutebuttons@choggi.org)



Added a temporary fix for extension turning unsigned after restarting Firefox (Duplicated css files)
Separated checkboxes/radio icons (and thanks to temp fix above, can't change mosaic they use for now)
Added machine translations for Русский, 日本語 , Polski, Español, Italiano, slovenčina, Ελληνικά, 한국어 , Українська, Euskara, Türkçe, suomi, Български, Tiếng Việt, Hrvatski, عربي, Română, Català, and Dansk
More icons / Fixed a few (Adblock plus/Mozilla Archive Format/Tab Mix Plus/Classic Theme Restorer/Others)
Showed Thunderbird some love (hopefully no more missing icons)
Fixed some issues with Cyberfox Browser
Added more Pale Moon support (statusbar icons/addon bar button)
Fixed some locale files
Startup is slightly faster
Some other under the hood work

release_notes.en-US:
updated for Firefox 4
added a bunch of icons to Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / Seamonkey 2.1
fixed issues with firebug
fixed an issue with the AIOS customize dialog and flickering
fixed issue with Download Sort clear button
changed the copy link/image location icon to one more appropriate
added Hungarian translation
thanks to kami
